Is there any way possible for the KC Royals to come out of this slump, they just lost about 10 games in a row. Are they going to wind up doing worse than last year? They did so well in the preseason.
Master_Shake

Is there any way possible for the KC Royals to come out of this slump, they just lost about 10 games in a row. Are they going to wind up doing worse than last year? They did so well in the preseason.

 God knows. They always seem to have a streak of decency and then just plummet. I'm going to see them play Oakland a week from today. They've been picked by some to win the World Series this year. The Royals have a history of losing to bad teams and beating supposedly good ones, (If I remember right, a few years ago when the Yankees won it, the Royals beat them twice) so who knows what will happen here, but I don't have my hopes to high.
